import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faBars, faCoffee } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import './App.css'; import UploadUser from './uploadUser'; import EmployeeDashboard from './employeeDashboard'; import EmployeeCRUD from './employeeCRUD'; import EmployeeAbout from './employeeAbout'; function App() { return (
